res.rBody:
De ore prudentis
procedit procedet mel alleluia dulcedo mellis est lingua eius
alleluia alleluia alleluia
favus favum distillans labia eius
alleluia alleluia alleluia

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-F

verses.vBody: Quam dulcia faucibus meis eloquia tua domine super mel et favum ori meo

Sapientia
requiescit requiescet in corde eius et prudentia in sermone oris illius

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L
